rooms.description: Spacious living area with high ceilings and exposed concrete beams, aligned with Vastu principles for social harmony.
Functional kitchen with industrial finishes. Complies with local fire safety norms and ventilation requirements.
Dining area integrated into the living space, open plan layout with durable flooring and minimalist design.
2BHK first bedroom featuring a spacious balcony. The orientation is east for morning light following Vastu guidelines.
Second bedroom with its own balcony, oriented towards the south to capture optimal sunlight as per Vastu principles.
Spacious balcony for bedroom1 ensuring privacy and natural light. Includes built-in seating.
Spacious balcony for bedroom2 with ample seating and greenery options, aligned for relaxation.
Primary bathroom designed with water-efficient fixtures and compliance to local plumbing standards.

openings.description: Reinforced concrete entry door with a wide corridor to accommodate heavy traffic and emergency exits.
Service door for utility access following building norms, placed opposite the main entrance.
Balcony access opening for bedroom1 ensuring ease of movement while maintaining structural integrity.
Balcony access opening for bedroom2 ensuring ease of movement and proper alignment with local codes.

rooms.description: Upper level bedroom featuring a private balcony for extra outdoor space and Vastu compliant east orientation.
Upper level second bedroom with its own balcony facing south for balanced sunlight.
Balcony extension for bedroom1 providing outdoor leisure space and privacy.
Balcony extension for bedroom2 offering a serene view and adherence to Vastu principles.
Secondary bathroom on the first floor with fixtures that meet local codes and sustainable design practices.

openings.description: Staircase connecting the two levels with reinforced concrete and compliance to safety norms.

rooms.description: Loft space integrated into the second floor design, providing flexible living or storage area with Vastu alignment.
Additional bathroom for convenience and guest use, designed per local plumbing standards.

openings.description: Access point for maintenance and emergency exits on the roof.
